General.Name: Akkhie Prakarn Public Company Limited
General.Description: Akkhie Prakarn Public Company Limited engages in hazardous waste incineration business in Thailand. It is involved in the provision of services on incinerating and destroying industrial wastes, sewage and unused materials; and recycle to substituted energy and raw materials. The company also offers waste transportation system and incineration system; pollutant treatment system, which includes pollutant control system; ongoing monitoring and inspection system; hazardous waste quality improvement system. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand. Akkhie Prakarn Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Better World Green Public Company Limited.
General.Address: 792 Moo 2 Soi 1c / 1 Bang Poo Ind Estate, Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10280
